name: Spoil!
overview: Move the glowing diamond to all of the hidden tiles before time runes out! A total of 16 challenges await! When you find a hidden tile, it becomes visible, if you step on a blank spot, you go back to the starting point. Find all the hidden tiles to complete the level and go to the next one. TIME BONUS will give you 10 more time units. Walls can't be crossed. Use TELEPORTS with button/space to warp to another part of the level.
